text_block_list.text:
The day of Winning Ticket's longing has come. On the day of the 
Derby, she entrusted all her feelings.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Heh…

Winning Ticket took a deep breath and put her hand on her chest. 
Opened her eyes slowly, staring at the turf ahead of the light.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
Ticket-san, you are more focused than 
ever. I can see it from your back.

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: I usually hear a loud voice that the voice echoes.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Ahh～… Rice is getting nervous too…

Team <Sirius> members also stayed up all night, watching the 
brave back of Winning Ticket… But it is.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Hmm… Hmmm～!! It's no use!! it's itchy!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
When I try to focus I get nervous! 
When I get nervous I get itchy～!!
After all, it's the usual Tickezou.
After all, it's the usual Tickezou.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
If your usual method isn't working out, 
we'll send you out in a special way.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Special way?

Mejiro Mcqueen then signaled to the Sirius members, all of them 
spreading their palms behind Winning Ticketー

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: O-One-two!

text_block_list.name: Everyone
text_block_list.text: See you later!!
(Slap!)
ーAnd hit Winning Ticket on the back.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Kyaa～～!! It's to strong～～!!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
With that you're alright now! Ticket-san, 
show us the best Derby ever!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Of course! I'll run with all my might!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
Until now, Derby was just excitement and 
longing, but now I'm on that stage…

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
There are rivals. there is everyone on the team and Trainer-san 
is here… This is my Derby!
choice_data_list: Let's take hold of the dream!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Yeah, I'm going!!
